title: NEC Director Lawrence H. Summers to Deliver Remarks on the Economy | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 15, 2009

 



NEC Director Lawrence H. Summers to Deliver Remarks on the Economy




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  _____________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                               July 15, 2009  NEC Director Lawrence H. Summers to Deliver Remarks on the Economy   WASHINGTON, DC – On Friday, July 17, 2009 at 11:00 am, Lawrence H. Summers, Director of the National Economic Council and Assistant to the President for Economic Policy, will deliver remarks at the Peterson Institute for International Economics.  Dr. Summers will provide a progress report on economic policy and Obama Administration efforts to rescue and rebuild the U.S. economy.   The Peterson Institute is handling all media logistics and credentialing.  For information and credentials, please e-mail Katharine Keenan, kkeenan@piie.com.  The Peterson Institute is located at 1750 Massachusetts Avenue, NW.       ##
